attributes.action: Reduce the consumption of plastic in stores by several times
attributes.additional_details: I appeal to you who will sign this petition reduce use of plastic for example in supermarkets:plastic bag,packaging could be minimized. Plastic took  largest percentage on Earth and very dangerous.Milk сan be sold in glass bottles,recycled,used again and again.I wrote to supermarkets,but they ignored me completely.Another example how quick we can fill recycle bin in households,need to in courage supply chain to minimise use of plastic,otherwise we will came across with environmental disaster.
attributes.background: Reduce the consumption of plastic in stores by several times (ban on the sale of plastic bags )

rejection.details:
We understand that you would like to see the use of plastic decrease in stores, but it is unclear what measure you would like the Government to implement to make this happen. 

We currently have several petitions open on the topic of banning or decreasing the use of plastic in society. You may like to sign some of the below petitions:

Ban the use of virgin plastics in all packaging sold in the UK before 2023
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586539

Ban all single-use plastic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586547

Ban plastic bags illegal and require the use of biodegradable bags instead
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581139

Ban the manufacture of all products containing plastic in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571254

Ban fast food companies from using disposable packaging for advertising
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583267

Deposit scheme on glass, plastic, steel, aluminium bottles and cans.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572535

Ban the use of plastic packaging for all non-food items
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570065

Ban the use of plastic 6 pack rings in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571229
